website_summaries.verdict: A 45-quart portable camouflage freezer that is ideal for camping.
pros: A well-built freezer that has a temperature range of -8ºF to 50ºF
This model has an LED temperature display and it runs off a regular household outlet or a 12 volt battery
Some users have even run it off of solar power
cons: Some users felt that this model was heavier than expected for a portable unit

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, bad customer support.
customer_reviews.text: This stopped cooling in less that 10 months. I tried resetting, cleaning, and even running it on AC. Contacted customer support a week ago and have not heard a word. Now I am left with a cooler that has a digital thermometer that tells me when to switch out the ice jug from my freezer to maintain a decently low temp. Bad product, bad customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Oliver

customer_reviews.title: If you have any doubt any at all brush it aside believe me when I say this is the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Live on a 28ft sailboat in fort myers, fl. If you have any doubt any at all brush it aside believe me when I say this is the best bang for your buck. Its beautiful. From carrying 20lbs of ice to my boat daily for the last year to just finished eating ice cream after sailing all day. Words cant describe this luxury. 100W solar into my 180 amphr 12vdc AGM. Dropped to -08 from 90 in 1 &1/2 hr.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hides

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution For My Schoolie Hippy Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hippy singe-mom daughter, for the converted school bus she lives in with her 10 year old son. I wired it up to a 12vdc solar system (not ac from the inverter). She accesses it about three times a day and I've noticed the compressor turn on 3 to 5 times a day and run for 5-7 minutes each time. It's very quiet. Because it's "reach-in" the cold air doesn't fall out. She loves it, and I'm very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Whynter has the worst customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit in spring of 2017. First I liked the fridge, it worked as advertised. But it only lasted 16 months before the compressor would no longer get cold. The warranty is only a year. After several phone calls and emails it has been a month now and I still don't have my fridge back form them. This is the short story of the circus that went on with Whynter. I really don't have it in me to go over the BS again. Even in story. I will be looking for a different company. Don't buy from Whynter.
customer_reviews.author: aaron Ensley

customer_reviews.title: Whynter FM-45CAM 45 Quart Camouflage Edition Portable Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: When the Whynter FM-45CAM 45 Quart Camouflage Edition Portable Refrigerator, AC 110V/ DC 12V True Freezer for Car, Home, Camping, RV-8°F to 50°F, Camoflauge was plugged in for testing it worked fine. When plugged in for a road trip, it did NOT work. The item was returned and we have asked about the refund of $464.76. Will inquire again because it has been longer than 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in a van conversion. I built an insulated case around it (with the vents cut out obviously) which definitely helps a lot. It's decently well insulated on its own but you can feel how cold it is to the touch so I know there's a lot of room for improvement. It runs very quietly and I like that it has precise temperature controls as well as the ability to put it in a more efficient mode which further reduces fan and compressor noise. While in the insulated case, it barely uses any electricity at all and holds it's temperature fairly effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Chief of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Burned out in one month.
customer_reviews.text: Burned out after one month of use. At first the temp gauge would say it was 10 degrees cooler than what it was set at. Yet everything inside was warm. Reset the cooler and there was a burning smell that came from it. No longer works. One month. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Schreckengost

customer_reviews.title: but it worked like a champ at keeping the food frozen
customer_reviews.text: We use this to store our homemade dog food when we travel. Loaded it into the back of the truck and plugged the 110 into an inverter that plugged into the cigarette lighter inside truck. We we arrived at our campsite, we plugged it into the 110 outlet located outside the camper. Since it was stored in the heat of south Florida, we had to lower the temperature quite a bit, but it worked like a champ at keeping the food frozen. We didn't use the DC plug that came with it because the extension DC plug that we purchased separately was junk. We already had the inverter on hand and it worked great with it. This freezer/refrigerator is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L Darby

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, efficient, and works exactly as advertised. I can switch from DC to AC without skipping a beat. Keeps foods and gel packs frozen with little energy consumption. Rotating frozen gel packs in/out of a separate cooler and you can keep a ton of food refrigerated/frozen indefinitely. I'm amazed at how little power is needed to operate. Roughing it is certainly much improved with this!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: $500.00 junk
customer_reviews.text: Hahaha over a $500.00 mistake, stopped cooling after just 6 months, they say send it back they'll fix or replace it, thing is after 2 months customer is responsible for shipping costs of there defective product, shame on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept things cool, 160w roof panel was adequate to power it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in a truck camper powered with a solar panel. Took it on a trip to Utah, worked well! Kept things cool, 160w roof panel was adequate to power it. Fan is pretty quiet, didn't disturb our sleep. A minor complaint is the 12v plug didn't seem to make a real solid connection with the socket; might find a better plug and replace it. We were thinking about getting the next larger size, but this is heavy enough, especially with food in, so I think this was a good choice. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F.

customer_reviews.title: Edited review
customer_reviews.text: Being cautiously optimistic because my last fridge off amazon broke pretty quickly, though it was a different kind than this. This whynter fridge is sturdy, good energy consumption, gets cold in a very reasonable amount of time, has adequate storage room for 1-2 people, and its sides are thicker than other fridges I see on amazon, which helps with the insulation. Am really liking my fridge so far. Worth every penny to finally have cold water Eggs and bacon again. Edit: it broke and had to be returned, stopped regulating temperature correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Zwaanhild

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: ****Update a few months into ownership now, this was an awesome investment it works absolutely flawlessly for me as a trucker. I've been using it a couple weeks now. I'm a truck driver. It's perfect for my needs. Set it 28 degrees, all my drinks are perfectly half frozen all the time. Running it off an inverter and a huge battery bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B Christo

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected!
customer_reviews.text: At first we were very impressed with the unit. When I put in a thermostat to monitor the internal temp I found the cooler works with fairly large temperature swings. I had to unplug the power to even out the temperature. In two years ( used it 3 times ) the cooler stopped working on 12 volts. Original repair parts are not available ( according to the manufacturer ) for a two years old unit it is terrible. I will use the unit with an inverter, but I have little hope that it will work to justify the original cost ( plus inverter )
customer_reviews.author: Julius Garai

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly quit working two weeks after two month return period ...
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly quit working two weeks after two month return period ended. Moreover, it quit working while I was on a road trip across the U.S. in the hottest part of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Cooper, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The price is awesome! She is a little bit of an energy ...
customer_reviews.text: This fridge has worked really well for so far. The price is awesome! She is a little bit of an energy big compared to other brands but, I have nothing bad to say about it. Arrived well packaged and timely. Been using it constantly for about 6-7 months and haven't any issues. I have it hard wired straight to my aux battery and also to the 110 outlet. It switches automatically when my van is plugged in to shore power and when I unplug the fridge kicks right over to DC. Very happy with this fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A. Nearhoof

customer_reviews.title: It was at set temperature within 60 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be very well built. Instructions were easy to understand. It uses very little energy and cooled very quickly. It was 73° I set the refrigerator/freezer down to 29 and it took less than an hour. Very quiet and just barely hear it run. I bought this product on 3/22/2019 and will update as things progress.
customer_reviews.author: Creed

customer_reviews.title: After only a few days the fan started to make clicking noises.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, wanted to take this on a weekend trip and had to send it back. The unit started off working fine then just days later the fan started making noises. Would of been nice if they would of sent a replacement while I sent the other back what a slow painful process. Will purchase locally.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer
customer_reviews.text: Freezer is working well. We put it in a compartment in our RV and took off for NY state from AZ. kept things frozen and worked well. We replaced a Norcold freezer woth this one. That one cost $200.00 more and only lasted 3 years. We were delighted when we found this one for around $200 less and seems well built just as good. It automatically switches from battery to electric and vice versa. That is a plus. The norcold didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Shawneel

customer_reviews.title: Changed this Driver's life.
customer_reviews.text: I am a truck driver and this refrigerator changed my life for the better. I can buy groceries, freeze them in this bad boy, and thaw them out slowly in my electric cooler. I would recommend this to any other truck driver who was on the fence. If you like frozen meals, you can get em. Ice cream? You betcha! Those frozen burritos? Yeah, man. Spend money now on a good fridge/freezer and it'll save you tons in groceries you otherwise might have had to toss out when your electric cooler can't keep em cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Naraskae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in October 2016...After 4 months testing it there are no regrets. Low amps (0.56) on 12 volts dc and set to 35°F...almost no drain at all to my 230/115 ah system...metal handles and very well protecting packaging... Talks the talk and walks the walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I JUST LOVE IT. light wight
customer_reviews.text: I JUST LOVE IT. light wight, ease to set up the temperatures, it even frees what ever you need. i toke thi frege to camping it kept my drinks and food nice and cool and conserved for a week. i hook it up to my trucks battery and only had turn the truck on one time keep the battery charged. it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 18 months then done. Tried cleaning it all out, fans fins etc but no joy. Bummer deal
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it sure didn't last long. Wish I could have bought a warranty. Not exactly sure how long we had it but not more then 2 years and just stopped working. It's been about 10 months since it stopped working. Poor product
customer_reviews.author: T B.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, but I should have gotten next smallest size because I don't think I can get it into the trunk of my Volkswagen Jetta. It works great and holds the cold very well even though I ordered the freezer cover for added insulation because I live in Arizona. All around it is well made but a little heavy (I am 69 and not very strong.)
customer_reviews.author: G W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it several months now. It’s been running the whole tome and I use it as an auxiliary freezer. Works great and holds more than I expected. I considered the larger size but glad I bought the slightly smaller one. A larger one would be hard to move around. This one is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jetjam

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this now for about 3 years almost every weekend. So far so great! Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy j

customer_reviews.title: Travel freezing.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a good. However, I think it was damaged at the factory before it was put in the box to ship. Because the outer box and inner box was not dented. The product it’s self was dented where one of the vents are. I would have returned it but we were on a tight time line and couldn’t. I have a video of damage.
customer_reviews.author: theresa A Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good after 11 months in my tractor trailer. The only issues I've had is that somehow the temperature setting got stuck at 00 and I just unplugged it for awhile and it reset itself, the included 12V cable died after a few months also. The fan is getting a little noisy but performance has been rock solid. I put cold items in on Monday morning and turn on my inverter and the freezer immediately starts cooling down to 34 degrees and stays within 4-5 degrees until I turn it off on Saturday afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality well built refridger but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality well built refridger but unfortunately the compressor died after a long trip on a rough unpaved road. Need to call the company to see what they can do for me. Other than that it cooled fast, rock solid build.
customer_reviews.author: sjh

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: we bought the freezer cor our motorhome to add space for the frozen dog food! it is great! We love it so far tje freezer works like a charm. On the road we plug in the 12 volt and when we are hooked up on power we switch it to shore power. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: freezer
customer_reviews.text: This freezer/refrigerator is one of the best products I have bought on Amazon. We drive a large truck and could never keep ice cream in our truck until now, this has exact temp settings and ice cream comes out rock hard. I would highly recommend this to everyone essentially with its AC/DC plug hook ups
customer_reviews.author: William h Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great little freezer. 110 or 12v. Modular design so easy to fix when the time comes. Cools from 50 to -8 in about an hour. This is our second one. First one died after bouncing around in our VW camper for 8 years. Replaced compressor controller in 45 minutes. Now we have 2. Also good when the garden overloads our larger freezer
customer_reviews.author: Terry Deuel

customer_reviews.title: So far it works as advertised and I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: My initial test, at home with AC only. With the unit mode to fast freeze it did just that. With in 2hours the thermostat was reading -5. Runs quiet. I'm hoping the DC mode performs as well. The advertised included power cords: 8-feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord; Two removable wire baskets; Insulated lid and walls; ETL approved. For my use I was counting on that 8' AC cord. Unfortunately it came with a 6' AC cord. The DC cord included was 10'. My solution was having a professional electrician install new AC power and DC outlets convenient for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Runs fantastic. Fit in our cupboard well. 12 volt and 110 volt works perfectly. Took 2 hrs to hit -2 and has been staying at 10 above for a week. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: actually it still runs great, still cools amazing and only on the hottest ...
customer_reviews.text: this fridge ran almost non stop for 2 years with zero issues. actually it still runs great, still cools amazing and only on the hottest of days do I source a small amount of dry ice to keep inside. (about a pound a day for a full freezer in temps of 100+) I also kept my temps just above freezing
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW E.

customer_reviews.title: Broken twice, but service has been good
customer_reviews.text: I've had some issues with this fridge but luckily Whynter has been willing to work with me on sending out a replacement. It's working well at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good unit. We use in the basement of our Motor coach as an extra freezer. Have it running on 120AC and it stays at four degrees even in Texas summer heat. Contents stay frozen solid.
customer_reviews.author: bossdoug

customer_reviews.title: Cooler that is more like a refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping trip and long drive. No need to go through pounds of ice, food floating in water, buying food daily because you can't keep it cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It worked excellent! No more buying blocks of ice
customer_reviews.text: Used this unit on our 5 week boating trip. It worked excellent ! No more buying blocks of ice ! I'm very pleased how well it keep the temperature and the little power it uses. Great addition to our boat.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fry

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Now I can eat healthy while driving long ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put this in my van. Works great. Now I can eat healthy while driving long distances. It is hooked up to my solar panel, and draws very little power..
customer_reviews.author: jrsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for nomadic living
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this full time, in my van, for 2 months now. Works great and I love the digital display that monitors my batteries power. Running in solely on solar. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. Sue Vess

customer_reviews.title: This is better insulated than my Dometic
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous fridge freezer. Quick shipping..well packaged..all cords and instructions. It worked perfectly and held temperature. I need to return it because it used more amps than our boat battery house bank could handle in a 24 hour period. This is better insulated than my Dometic...sad to say goodby!!
customer_reviews.author: Talley C Meachum

customer_reviews.title: Whynter 45 Qt. Portable Refrig/Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as an additional refrigerator in our RV. Unit worked great right out the box. Cools down quickly and operation is quiet, which is important to us as it resides in our bedroom. Fit and finish is very good. Holds temperature to a plus/minus 2 degrees from our setting of 39 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: MacM

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I am using it in my truck. I will update review if anything happens Update March 30 2020 Still going strong keeps food at perfect temperature was worth the high price. I use it everyday in my truck!
customer_reviews.author: Caiden Skye

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control was tricky, we used the same temperature that our home fridge was on, only it froze all our food that wasn’t supposed to like our eggs, fruits, juice, so I would recommend to play with it at home first before you ruin your food.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: thus far very satisfied, temperature remained stable within the predicted range
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this freezer/fridge now for about two months on a almost weekly basis, so almost every weekend. We leaved it plugged in at home and then plug it in the 12V outlet from the car when traveling. thus far very satisfied, temperature remained stable within the predicted range. While for some the weight of the fridge filled might give an issue, the compact size and the capacity are just great for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Benne P.

customer_reviews.title: More chinese junk that doesnt last.
customer_reviews.text: At about 3 years sonething in the controller screwed up and it wouldnt run on 12v only 110vac. Within another year that screwed up too and it doesnt work at all now just flashes a yellow light. Maybe I am expecting too much and 4 years is all you get out of em? Dont know I just have a broken freezer time for aother not likely a whynter.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Lucier

customer_reviews.title: Good refrigerator it works good
customer_reviews.text: This was a great refrigerator little too high priced I mean you can almost buy a full size refrigerator for that kind of money
customer_reviews.author: Randy winegar

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best thing I've bought so far. It works perfectly and easy to use. LOVE THIS FRIDGE/FREEZER
customer_reviews.author: DJ Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Cooler showed up and in great condition upon receiving. Update in about a month.
customer_reviews.text: I will update in a month or two as I use it on vacation on the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: well built great freezer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this freezer for more freezer storage in my motorhome.unit works great on 12volt or AC.I mounted on slide out tracks in a lower compartment.highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Philip Vybihal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, it’s sturdy and works great, uses little energy
customer_reviews.author: Lee Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Working great.
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Working well. . Using as over flow freezer at home. Was great on traveling too. Wish I could ave afforded the DUAL option chest
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ellen Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge. I am easily running it off solar
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge . I am easily running it off solar. One thing tho. You should go ahead a replace the 12v plug right away. Somehow they put a cheap one on which caused the fridge to not work properly ..untill I figure out it wasn't getting the power it needed from the cheap plug. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: david a gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a truck driver and this is great for keeping food to cook and eat on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I love this so far
customer_reviews.text: This freezer was delivered on a hot day and the display read 97 degrees when I powered it up. I set the temperature to -8 and in less than 3 hours it froze a glass of water solid. Another popular brand could not freeze a glass of water overnight set at -22 degrees. I love this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yoseph

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this to anyone who does road trips
customer_reviews.text: We've been on a couple road trips with this fridge, and it has done very well for us. I would highly recommend this to anyone who does road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. S. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product great service and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product great service and delivery! This unit is 110VAC or 12VDC and works perfectly. Has a setting to dial in the exact temperature you want and will get down super cold!!!! Love it and recommend this product. Holds over 100 ice cold Red Bull cans!
customer_reviews.author: A.R.Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to any truck driver looking for a deep ...
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. My food stays frozen. This has enabled me to cut down on my expenses while on the road (as a truck driver) and I do get to eat healthy food. It works perfectly well. I recommend it to any truck driver looking for a deep freezer.
customer_reviews.author: David Warutere

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 7 months now, works like a champ! Great product-knock on wood!!! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Regina C

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep connected to power.
customer_reviews.text: Its quite good except the power cords (both ACand 12V seem to disconnect themselves from the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: liz bredberg

customer_reviews.title: Really  not to heavy I picked it up easy
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for small spaces. Freezes really fast even without fast freeze on. Can hold about months worth of food maybe more with right packing. Fast delivery to military FPO in a foreign Port. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: joe jordan

customer_reviews.title: Keep em cold!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my van for more then month now and it works really well keeping all the drinks really cold.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: love how fast the cooling took the unit from 90 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built.love how fast the cooling took the unit from 90 deg to 30deg in around 30 mins using 120v. Left it on in the jeep over the last 24 hours. Set temp @ 34degs. At the end of the day the cooler had kept my battery from draining because of the low voltage cutoff. The cooler temp was @ 50 deg and outside temp was 90. Very happy i was able to start the jeep drive for 10 mins and cooler temp was down to 40 degs. Edit 2-4-19 installed a 100w solar panel on the jeep. Have been running it 24/7 for a couple of years now. Keeps my sodas @ 35 degs. Love this fridge.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mance

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, but HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Does a super job at cooling , set at 40 initially, during 24 hour test, then shifted to 42 degrees because it overshoots a bit and brings it to 36 degrees. The only issue is the weight, EMPTY it is hefty allready, and filled would require two folks to transport !
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R Williams

customer_reviews.title: This unit worked way beyond my expectations. I just ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked way beyond my expectations . I just wish I had ordered a larger one.. 24 hrs. on a 12 volt deep cell battery is no problem if you don't leave it open all the time. Common sense goes a long way here.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D.

customer_reviews.title: Adds to our time outside
customer_reviews.text: Have this on our back patio. Ordered it because it could be used outdoors. Keeps drinks cold & within easy reach. Loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Whynter FM-45G PORTABLE REFRIGERATOR/FREEZER
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a chest freezer that would fit in a small area in our motorhome & this was perfect. We travel all winter & hopefully this will fill all our expectations with the extra freezer space we need.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Use this to keep meat frozen for our dogs when they are on the road at shows... Kept everything frozen when temps in the 80's
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the refrigerator! Using it in our van and it works great! How did we live without one for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: great for off-roading
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip a few days after purchase. Worked like a champ, really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Was surprised to see how big the thing actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instruction booklet not very helpful. Took awhile to figure out the instrument panel. Jury is still out on this.
customer_reviews.author: colleen margolis

customer_reviews.title: Great! !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Have one in my van. This one is for my cargo trailer. It's the way I live now. Great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Shandera

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works like it’s supposed to and does what it says it’s gonna do. Can’t ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trucker approved freezer
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this freezer. It has been working off a cigerette lighter socket in my rig. For a month now. It has maintained -2 this whole time with no fluctuation. Mine,sits in the passanger seat I have been bragging about it to everyone. I am no longer confined to a truck stop which is in large part to having a microwave. I love a pretty smile from a waitress but the satisfaction from self reliance is indeed a more alluring endeavor. Amazon delivery was as promise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in, it dropped the internal temperature to 0, and poof a chest freezer in m RV. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: William Bonsky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is a good one but it draws a lot of power. It is also heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CUDA

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this cooler for a month but during this time it has worked very well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Mae

customer_reviews.title: cool, as described
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, was at 74 degrees, 30 minutes later. 46. WOW!! Fast, cool, as described.
customer_reviews.author: aloha44

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed an emergency freezer. This product arrive faster than promised and has meet my needs very well
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an OTR truck driver and we bought this for him to have home cooked meals on the go. This is a GREAT! size 45qt for a a trucker with a standard truck. I fill this thing with food saver meals that last him about 45+ meals (dinner wise) and lunch meats and he throws in a daily pop the night before he goes to sleep. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but quit working at 15 months wanted 160 to repair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler works great,great customer relations broke the handle replaced quick.thing is a little heavy but its so quite you cant even hear it running.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its mounted in the jeep and its great for camping. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kent B.

customer_reviews.title: Product it self works great. Shipping was not.
customer_reviews.text: Product is absolutely great. Love it however, it came dented. I will be adding the huge dent the box looked fine however. So either they knowingly sent me a dented item. Or somehow the item was banged up without denting the box itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Living

customer_reviews.title: Gets cold in a hurry!
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets cold in a hurry and it uses very little power. it runs all day on my van's solar panels.
customer_reviews.author: Debera Van Nimwegen

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator/Freezer does what it says
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback to this workhorse is the fact that it weighs 49 pounds empty. We use it for camping and it holds up in humidity and heat, very well insulated. I just can't lift it myself empty, much less when it's stocked.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge/Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the reviews and so far I have been very impressed. It's a good size for those who have space limitations. It cooled from room temperature (75*F) to 38*F in just a few minutes and it's very quiet. I really like the design, inside and out, and the digital readout that shows the current temperature inside the unit. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: portable refrig
customer_reviews.text: we use the refrig at nascar races. it is in the motorhome. fits great in one of the storage bays. holds food and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: joseph a bender

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is awesome. Took it camping
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is awesome. Took it camping, powered it with a 100Ah battery, charges with a 120watt solar panel. It kept a fairly steady 38 degrees all week end. It's quiet when running as well. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Works great will buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time. no damage. Worked right out of the box. Does swing about 4 degrees up or down from temp setting mostly depends how often you open the lid. I have it in an outside storage compartment in my motor home. It is used as an fridge so I don't need a cooler and ice. Works great will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: ajp

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The whynter is not cheap but it works flawlessly . Inside my boat in summer the temp is often above 100 degrees but the whynter keeps every thing at a constant 36 degrees. It will run on the two marine batteries for about 60 hours and will shut off before damaging them. I am extremely pleased with this product so far. I have only used it for a couple of months but so far works very well
customer_reviews.author: John McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Best portable frig/freezer for the moneyh
customer_reviews.text: Very rapid cool down from 87 degree ambient Single solar panel is able to keep battery bank charged for multiple days. Low current draw..
customer_reviews.author: Terence L Shugart

customer_reviews.title: Grrreat fridge
customer_reviews.text: The Whynter refrigerator freezer seems to work great out of the box. It uses very little power. We will have to see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but will not freeze/ get super cold  if packed full (like most freezers? idk)
customer_reviews.text: Does not freeze if packed full, I was hoping to keep it packed full of frozen things to keep it cold longer with lower energy usage however it never gets below 20 which is actually not enough to freeze certain items... if i remove most the items the temp will get down to 15, and lower. Sometimes the wires come loose on the circuitry through shipping so try and reconnect them before having to return this item for a new one.. I want to velcro a cutting board to the top of this thing for added functionality.
customer_reviews.author: george bush

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and preforms as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and preforms as advertised. I'm a truck driver, and I don't like to waist my health and budget eating out all the time. This unit gets cold enough (-3 to -8) to keep my home cooked meals frozen. It dose take up a fair amount of space, but I wanted the storage capacity of the larger unit. I love how it automatically draws from either the AC or DC power depending on what I feed it. Overall I'm very happy with my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Maloney

customer_reviews.title: We've only used it couple times but works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it couple times but works like a charm, will see this Spring when we travel with it!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Koski

customer_reviews.title: No your problem is not mine!
customer_reviews.text: I think 12 volt leaves a lot to become good as 120v side. I run with inerverter on my boat far better than built in in unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  Max Anhoury

customer_reviews.title: Fridge ran great for about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Fridge ran great for about 3 months. Within the last 3 months it has steadily declined in performance and finally quit cooling completely. Since I bought it as a dented/open box and I've modified the fridge (cut the 12v plug and hard wired it) I don't expect it to be warrantied and I don't mind seeing how much it's going to cost to fix. However, I've been trying to get Whynter's customer service to give me a location for repair for 2 days and they've been nothing short of terrible for responding after the initial "trouble shooting" email. Great timing since I have a 5 day trip coming up in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Whynter FM-45CAM 45 Quart Camouflage Edition Portable Refrigerator, AC 110V/ DC 12V True Freezer for Car, Home, Camping, RV-8°F to 50°F, Camoflauge
product_meta.description: Color:CamoflaugeTake your drinks, meats or and other contents on the go with Whynter FM-45CAM 45-quart portable fridge/freezer. This special camouflage edition looks cool as it keeps your items cool (or frozen) in one premium and innovative design. It is perfect for RVs, boats, campsites, and fishing trips.
feature_bullets: 45 Quarts or 60 cans (12FL oz) capacity; Adjustable temperature range: -8°F to 50°F; LED temperature display; “Fast Freeze” mode rapidly cools to -8°F

Car, RV and home use; Operates as a refrigerator or freezer; work with 12/24V DC and 110V AC power; Voltage power AC (115V/ 60Hz – 65W/0.75A A) or DC (12V/24V – 4.5A /2.5A Car Lighter Socket); unit can be plugged in with both AC power and the DC power at the same time. If both AC and DC are plugged in at the same time, then the unit will primarily operate on AC. If the AC power source fails, DC will become primary power supply source.
8-feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord; Two removable wire baskets; Insulated lid and walls; ETL approved
Power low indicator; Functions even when tilted 30°; Tough and solid outer powder coated steel housing; Drain Plug for easy cleaning; Stainless steel side handles
Wattage: 65 Watts. Net weight: 45 LB. Internal dimensions: 18.5" W x 11" L x 15" H including a compressor step with 7.5" W x 11.5" L x 8" H; 45.46 dBA

specifications.Special Features: Power System Powerful Cooling Ability Portable and Rugged
specifications.Included Components: 8-feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord
